00056 class Application extends AbstractSingleton
00057 {
00058 //----------------------------------------------------------------- PUBLIC
00060         const SYSTEM_START_TIME = 'SYSTEM_START_TIME';
00061 
00062 //--------------------------------------------------------- Public Methods
00063         
00076     public static function GetInstance ( )
00077         {       
00078                 return parent::getThis( __CLASS__ );
00079         } //----- End of GetInstance
00080         
00090     public function GetConfiguration ( )
00091         {
00092                 return $this->configuration;
00093         } //----- End of GetConfiguration
00094         
00101     public function SetConfiguration ( Variables $configuration )
00102         {
00103                 if ( $configuration == NULL )
00104                 {
00105                         unset ( $this->configuration );
00106                         $this->configuration = new Variables( new BBDRecordSet() );
00107                 }
00108                 else
00109                 {
00110                         $this->configuration = $configuration;
00111                 }
00112         } //----- End of SetConfiguration
00113         
00114         
00123     public function Start ( )
00124         {
00125                 if ( $this->started )
00126                 {
00127                         $errors = new Errors ();
00128                         $errors->Add ( new ApplicationError ( ApplicationError::ALREADY_STARTED, 'Application has been already started.' ) );
00129                         
00130                         return $errors;
00131                 }
00132         
00133                 // get launchTime in microseconds
00134                 $this->systemVars[ self::SYSTEM_START_TIME ] = microtime ( true );
00135                 
00136                 // set up call back function for the end of the application
00137                 register_shutdown_function ( $this->onApplicationEnd, $this->systemVars );
00138 
00139                 return $this->launchCallBack ( 'onApplicationStart' );
00140         } //----- End of Start
00141         
00161     public function OnApplicationStart ( $function, $params )
00162         {
00163                 return $this->setCallBack ( 'onApplicationStart', $function, $params ) ;
00164         } //----- End of OnApplicationStart
00165         
00185     public function OnApplicationEnd ( $function )
00186         {
00187                 $falseArray = array();
00188                         $errors = $this->setCallBack ( 'onApplicationEnd', $function, $falseArray ) ;
00189                 unset( $falseArray );
00190                 
00191                 if ( $errors InstanceOf Errors )
00192                 {
00193                         return $errors;
00194                 }
00195 
00196                 return null;
00197         } //----- End of OnApplicationEnd
00198 
00199 //---------------------------------------------- Constructors - destructor
00203     protected function __construct()
00204     {
00205                 parent::__construct();
00206                 
00207                 $this->configuration = new Variables ( new BDDRecordSet() );
00208                 $this->started = false;
00209                 
00210                 $this->systemVars = array( );
00211         
00212                 $this->onApplicationStart = -1;
00213                 $this->onApplicationStartParams = -1;
00214                 
00215                 $this->onApplicationEnd = -1;
00216                 $this->onApplicationEndParams = -1;
00217     } //---- End of __construct
00218 
00219

00225     {
00226                 parent::__destruct();
00227     } //---- End of __destruct

00242 //------------------------------------------------------ protected methods
00243         
00257         protected function isCorrectCallBack ( & $function, & $params, Errors & $errors )
00258         {       
00259                 // function incorrect or doesn't have good scope
00260                 if ( !is_callable( $function ) )
00261                 {
00262                         $errors->Add ( new ApplicationError ( ApplicationError::FUNCTION_NOT_CALLABLE, 'Incorrect function or scope.') );
00263                 }
00264                 
00265                 // params not an array
00266                 if ( !is_array( $params ) )
00267                 {
00268                         $errors->Add ( new ApplicationError ( ApplicationError::FUNCTION_PARAM_NOT_ARRAY, 'Params of the function must be an array.') );                
00269                 }
00270                 
00271                 return ( $errors->GetCount () == 0 );
00272         } //------ End of isCorrectCallBack
00273         
00290         protected function setCallBack ( $callBackName, & $function, & $params )
00291         {                       
00292                 $errors = new Errors();
00293                 
00294                 if ( $this->isCorrectCallBack( $function , $params, $errors ) === false )
00295                 // if we had some errors
00296                 {
00297                         return $errors;
00298                 }
00299 
00300                 if ( ! IsSet ( $this->{$callBackName} ) || ! IsSet ( $this->{$callBackName.'Params'} ) )
00301                 {
00302                         $errors->Add ( new ApplicationError ( ApplicationError::CALLBACK_NOT_EXISTS, 'You tried to set up a callback that doesn\'t exists.') );
00303                         
00304                         return $errors;
00305                 }
00306                 
00307                 // association
00308                 $this->{$callBackName} = $function;
00309                 $this->{$callBackName.'Params'} = $params;
00310                 
00311                 unset ( $errors );
00312                 
00313                 return null;
00314         } //----- End of setCallBack
00315         
00325         protected function launchCallBack ( $callBackName )
00326         {
00327                 // launch start call_back function if set
00328                 if ( @$this->{ $callBackName } !== -1 )
00329                 {
00330                         call_user_func_array ( $this->{ $callBackName }, $this->{ $callBackName.'Params' } );
00331                         
00332                         return null;
00333                 }
00334                 else
00335                 {
00336                         $errors = new Errors();
00337                         $errors->Add ( new ApplicationError ( ApplicationError::CALLBACK_NOT_SET, 'You are trying to launch an unset callback function.') );
00338                         
00339                         return $errors;
00340                 }
00341         } //----- End of launchCallBack
00342
